1.0.name: wordpress/ehavior-website-heatmaps
1.0.description:
See where your users click on your website

Website heatmaps makes understanding your visitors easy!

The visual nature of heatmaps enables everybody to understand website usage patterns. Forget about struggling with Google Analytics - Website heatmaps will make YOU a web analytics expert.

This plugin will help you install the Ehavior tracking code on your Wordpress site by just entering your account id. Easy and simple.

Get an Ehavior account here
